front.title: Comments on on-line host name service

abstract.t: Peter Deutsch in RFC #606 pointed out the desirability of having a single host maintain a data base containing official host names and host addresses, as well as other information of secondary importance. Mike Kudlick in RFC #608 agreed with the concept, and proposed that the NIC would implement Peter's ideas. I would like to add my voice to those in support of such a service, and express a few ideas for its modification.
